title: Home Screen Load and Category Display
description: Verify that the home screen loads successfully and displays all categories correctly with a search box.

steps.description: Launch the Okey 101 Kural Rehberi app.
Verify that the home screen is displayed.
Verify all expected categories are listed.
Verify a search box is visible and interactable.

title: Category Detail Navigation and Rule Listing
description: Verify user can select a category from home screen and view listed rules in the category detail page.

steps.description: From home screen, tap on a category.
Verify navigation to category detail page.
Verify rules relevant to the category are displayed in a list.
Verify smooth and correct scrolling of list.

title: Rule Detail Page Displays Correct Information
description: Verify selecting a rule navigates to the rule detail page showing full explanation and content.

steps.description: Navigate to a category detail page.
Select a rule from the list.
Verify navigation to rule detail page.
Verify full explanation of the rule is visible.
Verify no data truncation or layout issues.

title: Keyword Search Returns Instant and Accurate Results
description: Verify that keyword-based search returns instant, relevant rule results matching the input query.

steps.description: Tap on the home screen search box.
Enter a known keyword related to a rule.
Verify search results are shown instantly.
Verify only relevant rules based on the keyword are listed.
Clear search and verify empty or default results.

title: Search Result Navigation to Rule Detail
description: Verify selecting a rule from search results navigates correctly to the rule detail page.

steps.description: Perform a keyword search.
Select a rule from the search result list.
Verify navigation to the rule detail page.
Verify rule detail content matches the selected search result.

title: FAQ Section Loads and Displays Questions and Answers
description: Verify that the FAQ section displays all commonly asked questions and their correct answers.

steps.description: Navigate to the FAQ section from the main menu.
Verify the list of FAQs is displayed.
Select an FAQ.
Verify the correct answer is displayed for the selected FAQ.

title: Strategy Guide Section Displays Tips and Tactics Correctly
description: Verify the strategy guide section loads and shows tips and tactics for Okey players accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the strategy guide section from main menu.
Verify the list of strategies is displayed.
Select a strategy tip.
Verify detailed information of selected strategy is shown correctly.

title: General Information Section Availability
description: Verify that the general information section loads and displays content about the Okey game.

steps.description: Navigate to the general information section.
Verify relevant information cards or text about Okey are displayed.

title: Settings Menu Functionality with Theme and Font Size Customization
description: Verify that users can change theme (including dark mode) and font size from settings and that preferences persist across app restarts.

steps.description: Open the settings menu.
Change the app theme to dark mode.
Verify UI updates to dark mode immediately.
Change the font size to a larger setting.
Verify text size updates accordingly.
Close and restart the app.
Verify theme and font size settings persist after restart.

title: Favorites Feature - Marking and Accessing Rules
description: Verify user can mark/unmark rules as favorites and access them quickly from favorites section.

steps.description: Navigate to a rule detail page.
Mark the rule as favorite.
Verify the rule is added to favorites list.
Navigate to favorites section.
Verify the marked rule is listed.
Unmark the rule from favorites.
Verify the rule is removed from favorites list.

title: Offline Usage Validation
description: Verify all features of the app (categories, rule details, search, FAQ, strategy, settings) work correctly without internet connectivity.

steps.description: Launch app with internet connection, allow data to populate.
Turn off internet connection (enable airplane mode).
Verify the app opens successfully.
Navigate through categories, view rule details.
Verify all content loads properly from local Room database.
Perform keyword search.
Verify search works offline with expected results.
Access FAQ and Strategy sections.
Verify FAQs and Strategy tips display without internet.

title: Material Design 3 UI Compliance and Dark Mode Synchronization
description: Verify UI elements comply with Material Design 3 guidelines and that dark mode is synchronized with system theme.

steps.description: Compare app UI components to Material Design 3 specifications.
Verify typography, spacing, colors, and controls match design specs.
Toggle device system theme between light and dark modes.
Verify app theme changes accordingly and synchronizes with system theme.

title: Statistics Tracking Accuracy
description: Verify that user gameplay performance statistics are recorded accurately and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Perform simulated gameplay interactions that impact statistics.
Verify that performance statistics increment or update accordingly.
Navigate to statistics display section.
Verify statistics values match expected results from user activities.

title: Data Integrity in Room Database
description: Verify that data stored in the Room database is consistent and accurate after various operations and saves.

steps.description: Add, update, and delete sample rule entries if supported.
Close and reopen the app.
Verify data persists as expected and no corruption is present.
Verify queries return correct data matching the stored records.

title: Dependency Injection Configuration via Hilt
description: Verify app modules correctly use Hilt for dependency injection without runtime errors and with proper scoping.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate through various feature modules.
Verify no errors or crashes due to dependency injection failures occur.
Verify dependencies are injected properly in ViewModels, Repositories, and other components by inspecting logs or debugging.

title: Smooth Navigation Between Fragments
description: Verify navigation between different fragments (home, category detail, rule detail, FAQ, strategy, settings) is smooth, including back button behavior.

steps.description: Navigate through each main fragment.
Verify fragment transitions are smooth and without glitches.
Use back button to navigate backwards through fragments.
Verify navigation order respects expected back stack behavior.

title: Error Handling for Search with No Results
description: Verify the app handles search queries with no matching results gracefully, providing user feedback.

steps.description: Enter a keyword unlikely to match any rule.
Verify a user-friendly message indicating no results found is displayed.
Verify no crashes or freezes occur.

title: Font Size Limits and Edge Cases
description: Verify font size adjustments respect minimum and maximum allowed values and do not break UI layout.

steps.description: Set font size to the minimum allowed value.
Verify UI is legible and elements are not cut off.
Set font size to the maximum allowed value.
Verify UI adjusts without overflow or layout breakage.

title: Concurrent Coroutines and LiveData Updates
description: Verify that asynchronous operations using Kotlin Coroutines and LiveData update the UI data streams correctly without race conditions or crashes.

steps.description: Trigger multiple data fetches and UI updates simultaneously (e.g., search while loading category).
Verify UI data is consistent, no stale or mixed data appears.
Verify no crashes or deadlocks occur during concurrent operations.

title: UI Adaptors Display Correct Data and Handle Empty States
description: Verify RecyclerView adapters for categories, rules, FAQ, info cards, strategies, and search results display correct data and handle empty datasets gracefully.

steps.description: Observe each RecyclerView in the app with normal data.
Verify list items match underlying data correctly.
Test cases with empty or no data available.
Verify empty state UI is shown and no crashes occur.
